page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT-OUR VIEW OF JOBS
page.content: JOBS TODAY ARE VERY HARD TO GET THERE ARE MANY DIFFERENT JOBS TO CHOOSE FROM SOME ARE DANGEROUS SUCH AS THE ARMY, NAVY ,AIRFORCE.SOME ARE NOT SO DANGEROUS LIKE LIBRARY ASSISTANTS. THE SIMPLEST JOBS ARE WORKING IN LITTLE SHOPS,SOME JOBS NEED O AND A LEVELS AND SOME DONT NEED ANY O OR A LEVELS SUCH AS STREET CLEANERS OR A WINDOW CLEANER,SOME PEOPLE ARE NOT AS SKILLED AS OTHERS.SOME PEOPLE MAY BE VERY SKILLED BUT MAY NOT BE ABLE TO DO A BUILDERS JOB OR A WAITERS JOB etc. SOME PEOPLE THINK THAT EVERY JOB IS EASY BUT THEY AREN'T.
